messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Grooming
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks so much for all the suggestion. I think he just has this head wet aversion, he loves games and colored soaps and such, has no aversion to washing or
messages.messageBody:
Thanks so much for all the suggestion. I think he just has this head wet
aversion, he loves games and colored soaps and such, has no aversion to
washing or baths. But some of the ideas were really neat....we'll try them!

Brenda


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Grooming
messages.msgSnippet: When my dad was bed ridden we used a product by Aveeno -- a waterless body cleanser. It was pleasant smelling and didn t  need rinsing,  just wash with a wash
messages.messageBody:
When my dad was bed ridden we used a product by Aveeno -- a waterless
body cleanser.
It was pleasant smelling and didn't need rinsing, just wash with a wash
cloth. We used it on his hair and it worked great. I think there are
other brands available at health food stores too.
Deb L
